data_points.content:
Days off
Recommended PTO days
is set to encourage employees to take PTOs as planned and it leads to meet the requirement by Labor Standard Act*
•Basically, is set at Obon week, year-end & new year holidays and between holiday and holiday.
•Is not set during AZSA’s busy audit season (mid-January to mid-March and early-April to mid-June). Need to take care not to affect your work related
to AZSA’s audit work when taking PTO during this period,
•Just recommended, not required, to take time off. Make sure not to interfere with your work when taking PTO even on Recommended PTO days.
•*Labor Standards Act requires all employees who are granted 10 days of annual leaves or more to take at least five days of paid time off (PTO) per
year.

1. Applicant : Request vacation by Teams to the following approver a week prior.

4. Input leave category on vacation days in the time sheet of LYSITHEA .

OOO

Flow

1. When you take vacation/leave

<For all KIT members>

1. Applicant : Request vacation/ leave by Teams to the following approver a week prior.　   <Approver> OU Head and Product Owner

For long vacation, request should be made earlier not to impact your team and business.

2. Approver : Confirm the request by Teams　3. Applicant:  Input and submit vacation info in “KIT 2.0 App OOO Schedule" after getting approval from the approver.　4. Input leave category on vacation days in the timesheet of LYSITHEA . *This process #4 is not required for Temp staffs, and Contractors

Be sure to complete the timesheet before taking leaves.

KIT 2.0 App "OOO schedule" do the followings for you. ★Here is the link to KIT 2.0 App support channel.

2  Here is the link for setting  KIT-OOO Outlook Calendar

answer:
To take personal time off, you should follow the procedure outlined below:

1. Request vacation by using Teams to the appropriate approver (OU Head and Product Owner) at least one week in advance.
2. The approver will confirm your request through Teams.
3. After receiving approval, input and submit your vacation information in the "KIT 2.0 App OOO Schedule."
4. It is not required to input leave category on vacation days in the time sheet of LYSITHEA.

Please note that it is important to ensure that your personal time off does not interfere with your work responsibilities, especially during AZSA's busy audit seasons.
